meanings.definition: Engaged in a brief, confused fight or struggle
meanings.sent1: The scuffled cat quickly ran away from the dog.
meanings.sent2: The scuffled students were separated by the teacher.
meanings.sent3: The scuffled squirrels argued over the last acorn.
meanings.sent4: The scuffled siblings made peace after their disagreement.
meanings.sent5: The scuffled birds fought over the best nesting spot.

meanings.definition: Moved with a quick, shuffling gait
meanings.sent1: The scuffled old man walked slowly down the street.
meanings.sent2: The scuffled feet shuffled along the dusty path.
meanings.sent3: The scuffled penguin waddled awkwardly on the ice.
meanings.sent4: The scuffled leaves danced in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The scuffled dog trotted happily in the park.
